You have learned how to use your sling to fell enormous creatures. When you hit on an attack with a [sling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=13) against a Large or larger creature, increase the size of the weapon damage die by one step (details on increasing weapon damage die sizes can be found [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=226)).
